channel.title: Can't load lump 53, allocation of 17411653 bytes failed!!!
channel.description:
Was playing the game and then it crashed and displayed that box - what does it mean?
Faulting application name: hl2.exe, version: 0.0.0.0, time stamp: 0x470c11ae Faulting module name: materialsystem.dll, version: 0.0.0.0, time stamp: 0x4b674cfa Exception code: 0xc0000005 Fault offset: 0x00014c4a Faulting process id: 0x1e44 Faulting application start time: 0x01cd9469d4186498 Faulting application path: e:\games\steamm\steamapps\****_*****\source sdk base 2007\hl2.exe Faulting module path: e:\games\steamm\steamapps\****_*****\source sdk base 2007\bin\materialsystem.dll Report Id: 25f34ee5-005d-11e2-9d93-002522c2f0e9

item.source: Can't load lump 53, allocation of 17411653 bytes failed!!!

item.title: Can't load lump 53, allocation of 17411653 bytes failed!!!
item.dc:creator: old_liquid
item.description:
I also have this issue, three or four times by now, and last when killed by the copter on the dam (underwater).
Looks like memory leak to me… (happens after many quicksave/quickloads)

Win 7 sp1 x86, 2gb ddr2, intel q6600 quad-core, MB MSI P45 Neo2, GeForce 8800GT.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't load lump 53, allocation of 17411653 bytes failed!!!

item.title: Can't load lump 53, allocation of 17411653 bytes failed!!!
item.dc:creator: CPU
item.description:
Steam has had this issue for a while https://support.steampowered.com/kb_article.php?ref=5724-WAGJ-0918

I’ve seen reports of changing the texture details to ‘high’ instead of ‘very high’ having solved the problem.

Read full topic

item.description:

8GB of DDR3 and an i7 870 as well if that helps.

item.description:

item.title: Can't load lump 53, allocation of 17411653 bytes failed!!!
item.dc:creator: jambo
item.description:
I just had this issue as well, I just got down the damn and was about to head in to the pipes and it crashed.

I’m assuming it’s a memory leak to do with saves as well as it was probably saving at that point.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't load lump 53, allocation of 17411653 bytes failed!!!

item.title: Can't load lump 53, allocation of 17411653 bytes failed!!!
item.dc:creator: chiro
item.description:
Hello, I have this error “lump 53” often, it’s always happening when I load many times a quick save (when I lose too much HP, for example). It looks like a memory leak, but I’m not sure. It doesn’t corrupt the save hopefully

Read full topic

item.title: Can't load lump 53, allocation of 17411653 bytes failed!!!
item.dc:creator: Tonemapped
item.description:
I see this is an HDR issue (lump 53). Will turn if off and see if that works. If it helps it was on the section just after loading when you are on the freight transporter just after launching the missile.
